com.communote.server.core.blog

Class NoteMailMessageWorkerBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.core.mail.fetching.MailMessageWorker
      • com.communote.server.core.blog.NoteMailMessageWorkerBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NoteMultipleAddressesMailMessageWorker, NoteSingleAddressMailMessageWorker

    public abstract class NoteMailMessageWorkerBase
extends MailMessageWorker
    Parent class for mail message workers that create posts from emails.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Method Detail

      • extractSquareBracketContentFromSubject

        protected String extractSquareBracketContentFromSubject(javax.mail.Message message)
                                                 throws javax.mail.MessagingException
        Returns the white-space trimmed content of the first square brackets pair found inside the email subject which encapsulates some word characters.
        Parameters:
        message - the email message whose subject will be examined
        Returns:
        the content of the brackets
        Throws:
        javax.mail.MessagingException - when a messaging exception occurred

      • getMailAddressOfSender

        protected String getMailAddressOfSender(javax.mail.Message message)
                                 throws javax.mail.MessagingException
        Extracts the email address of the sender. In case more than one FROM fields are set, the first InternetAddress is taken.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to examine
        Returns:
        the email address
        Throws:
        javax.mail.MessagingException - in case of an error
